description: {"blocks":[{"key":"dq0vb","text":"This method describes isolation of RNA from cultured cells, generation of cDNA, and relative quantification of transcript levels by qPCR.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"8j3o0","text":"Solutions to prepare:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aqgjd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"73kkl","text":"DMEM solution: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9s42g","text":"        FBS  10%    Penicillin  100 U/ml    Streptomycin  100 mg/ml    L-glutamine  2 mM  ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":90}],"data":{}},{"key":"ek6qd","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":""},"colTitles":[],"colWidths":[200,194],"data":[["FBS","10%"],["Penicillin","100 U/ml"],["Streptomycin","100 mg/ml"],["L-glutamine","2 mM"]],"guid":"617A7008E00811EBA3380A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["FBS","10%"],["Penicillin","100 U/ml"],["Streptomycin","100 mg/ml"],["L-glutamine","2 mM"]],"rowHeights":[]}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and itâ€™s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9e4rm","text":"Culture the HeLa-M cells at   in 5% CO2 and DMEM containing 10% FBS,   penicillin,   streptomycin, and   L-glutamine (all from Gibco).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":38,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":69,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":83,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":103,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fvf56","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F2483230E00811EB9D89A72FDFA514EC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"F79EC5F0E00811EB9D89A72FDFA514EC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1584}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"FFF55340E00811EB9D89A72FDFA514EC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"2","error_concentration":false,"guid":"026DCD50E00911EB9D89A72FDFA514EC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1cjsp","text":"For any given experiment, plate the cells at such density so as to be approximately 90% confluent at the time of lysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7u0ef","text":"For experiments using siRNA, transfect 60 pmols of the indicated siRNA using   Lipofectamine RNAiMax (ThermoFisher) in Opti-MEM (Gibco) per well according to manufacturer protocol. Lyse the cells   after siRNA transfection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":77,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":196,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b709a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"6","error":false,"guid":"0B421620E00911EB9D89A72FDFA514EC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":259200,"guid":"13F7B360E00911EB9D89A72FDFA514EC","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"83c4d","text":"Aspirate media from cells and rinse cells with PBS  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":51,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2pqhu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B9429C90E00911EB9D89A72FDFA514EC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4lbam","text":"Isolate RNA using RNeasy Micro Plus kit (Qiagen) according to manufacturerâ€™s protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5mt85","text":"Generate cDNA from   purified RNA using iScript cDNA synthesis Kit (Bio-Rad) according to manufacturerâ€™s protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2ogit","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"BE371320E00911EB9D89A72FDFA514EC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aq6lc","text":"Dilute the iScript reaction to a total of   Sterile Water (American Bio).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fngdl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"400","error":false,"guid":"C2454860E00911EB9D89A72FDFA514EC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7tdio","text":"Combine   SYBR Green Master Mix (BioRad) with   Sterile Water (American Bio) per sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"791r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"C69875E0E00911EB9D89A72FDFA514EC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"6.78","error":false,"guid":"C93A22D0E00911EB9D89A72FDFA514EC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"em5fe","text":"Combine   diluted SYBR Green Master Mix with   each of   forward and reverse primers per sample. Pipette this mixture into wells of 96-well qPCR plate. Perform at least two technical replicates for each sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":45,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":55,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dlvpt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"16.78","error":false,"guid":"CF519590E00911EB9D89A72FDFA514EC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.61","error":false,"guid":"D21C7560E00911EB9D89A72FDFA514EC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"D478DBF0E00911EB9D89A72FDFA514EC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eut6t","text":"Pipette   of diluted RNA from step 7 in well with SYBR Green Master Mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b4s37","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"E2504150E00911EB9D89A72FDFA514EC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d0it","text":"Run qPCR in CFX96 Real-Time System (BioRad) using the following protocol:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3iotq","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9aete","text":"          95 ËšCÂ   3 min      95 ËšCÂ   10 secÂ   Repeat 39x    55 ËšCÂ   10 sec      72ËšCÂ   30 sec      95 ËšCÂ   10 sec      65 ËšCÂ   5 sec      95 ËšCÂ   5 sec    ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":155}],"data":{}},{"key":"dp2h2","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","4_2":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","5_2":"","6_0":"","6_1":"","6_2":""},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":[200,194,"106"],"data":[["95 ËšC\u0026nbsp;","3 min",""],["95 ËšC\u0026nbsp;","10 sec\u0026nbsp;","Repeat 39x"],["55 ËšC\u0026nbsp;","10 sec",""],["72ËšC\u0026nbsp;","30 sec",""],["95 ËšC\u0026nbsp;","10 sec",""],["65 ËšC\u0026nbsp;","5 sec",""],["95 ËšC\u0026nbsp;","5 sec",""]],"guid":"69D68F4CE00911EBA3380A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{"C_2":[1,3]},"printData":[["95 ËšC\u0026nbsp;","3 min",""],["95 ËšC\u0026nbsp;","10 sec\u0026nbsp;","Repeat 39x"],["55 ËšC\u0026nbsp;","10 sec",""],["72ËšC\u0026nbsp;","30 sec",""],["95 ËšC\u0026nbsp;","10 sec",""],["65 ËšC\u0026nbsp;","5 sec",""],["95 ËšC\u0026nbsp;","5 sec",""]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4dh51","text":"Subtract the housekeeping gene (b-actin) mean threshhold cycle (Ct) values from transcript of interest mean Ct values to calculate Î”Ct.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"28fle","text":"Subtract the Î”Ct of the control sample from each sample Î”Ct to calculate the Î”Î”Ct value.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
